metadata.name: Malicious PowerShell Keywords
metadata.comment: Detects keywords from well-known PowerShell exploitation frameworks

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM script_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND (contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('adjusttokenprivileges')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('image_nt_optional_hdr64_magic')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('metasploit')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('microsoft.win32.unsafenativemethods')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('mimikatz')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('minidumpwritedump')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('page_execute_read')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('readprocessmemory.invoke')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('se_privilege_enabled')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('security_delegation')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('token_adjust_privileges')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('token_all_access')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('token_assign_primary')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('token_duplicate')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('token_elevation')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('token_impersonate')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('token_information_class')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('token_privileges')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('token_query'))))

output.summary: Detects keywords from well-known PowerShell exploitation frameworks

metadata.objective: False positive: Depending on the scripts, this rule might require some initial tuning to fit the environment Reference: https://adsecurity.org/?p=2921
